name: AXED (Soso <3)
description:
Goblins attacked your village, now you have to go into a bloody adventure, throwing axes and smashing goblin's head in order to revenge your clan.

_________________________________________________________________________

A/D - Movement

[space] - Jump

Mouse - AIM

Left Click - Throw Axes

___________________________________________________________________________

This game was a challenge, I tried to see how far I could go with only 50 events and all the limitations of C3.

This is the result.

Sprites:

--------Character by SanctumPixel

--------Enemies by LuizMelo
